name: Mine Rescue VR
description:
Your quest is to save miners after a collapse incident in a mine.

You need to find miners in the dark corridors and bring them back to the lift.

Be careful! You have limited supplies of oxygen and light battery. In addition, the lower you get, the faster your oxygen depletes.

The game features procedurally generated map, which also gets harder with each level.

To grab items as well as the miners, you need to place your hand close to them and grab them for a while.

You can save the battery by temporarily switching the light off, you can do it with a trigger button.

You will need a SteamVR compatible headset and controllers to play.
